text_block_list.name: Lottery Attendant
text_block_list.text:
There it is! 2nd prize! 『One day Resort and Spa tickets]! 
Congratulations~!

――And so, I went as soon as I could. Since it was 
built by the beach, the resort had a very open feel 
to it. I could just feel the fatigue melting away.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: Oh.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: So even someone like you would come to places like this, huh.
choice_data_list: I won tickets……you come here often?
I won tickets……you come here often?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: When I feel like it.

……Now I was a little curious how she spent her days off. 
If I understood more about her, things might go more smoothly.
choice_data_list: Do you mind if I tag along?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: You can do as you like.

And so, I ended up accompanying Mejiro Ramonu. 
The first thing she did was head to the shopping 
area, visiting a cosmetics shop first.

text_block_list.name: Shop Assistant
text_block_list.text:
――Mejiro Ramonu-sama. As always, thanks for your patronage. 
New seasonal products have just arrived, so please have a look.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: Oh, we're able to get these in Japan now too.

text_block_list.name: Shop Assistant
text_block_list.text:
Ah, so you were already aware. These are the newest versions 
with new ingredients. How about a quick touch up……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: From here to here……could you wrap these up?

text_block_list.name: Shop Assistant
text_block_list.text: Thank you very much.

Next was the spa. She headed to the VIP room alone, hitting 
the bath, sauna, and some aromatherapy too……or so I was told.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text:
……guess you aren't one for baths. 
Have you been there the whole time?

In fact, after taking a short bath I was relaxing 
and also enjoying a drink while waiting for her.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: I see…… Ahh, it's already time for my footcare appointment――

Afterwards, we had a slightly early dinner. At first glance, 
it looked like a casual meal, typical of a resort but……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: Right. And rich in seasonal flavors……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text:
We must be careful what enters our blood and becomes part of us. 
On the turf, we only have one body to rely on after all……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text:
Compromising on something like this, 
wouldn't be something I would call love.

All of today's self-care and even the meal in front 
of us, all of it was for the sake of "Races"……

When we finished our meal and went outside, the area 
was already enveloped in the colors of a sunset.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: Oh, what a nice evening.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: …………Maybe I should draw.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text:
Collecting fragments of this moment. By breaking 
them down, combining, and then layering them…… 
beyond all that, is where my painting exists.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: Aah, quickly…… before it disappears……

Mejiro Ramonu went to fetch her materials, 
then set up her easel and started sketching.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text:
……that evening star…… 
it started…… over there……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: ………That corner……remains empty.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: Then, over there. Standing straight is fine.

I stood where I was told. It was actually kind 
of hard to stand in the same position, but, if 
this was what she wanted, then it was nothing.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: Hmmmmm……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: ――You

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: So that's the look you had on your face, is it……?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: Hmmm…………

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: Would you mind not making weird faces?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: ……How strange. Looking at it head on again.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: How long has it been since……?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: Before I realized it, you were "there". You were always――

――And so the sun set, and I heard the sound of her 
putting the pencil down. For some reason, she continued 
to stare at her sketch, even as it got darker……

When it was completely dark, we headed back. While we waited 
for a taxi, I asked her how her painting was coming along……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: Who knows?
choice_data_list: I guess I wasn't a good model

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: Too self-deprecating.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: ……Ah. It's here.

She wasn't praising me……probably, but it didn't seem derogatory 
either. As usual, I still couldn't read Mejiro Ramonu.
